definition[0]: a government office or the office of a large international organization, especially one that has a secretary general in charge of it
example[0]: the United Nations Secretariat in New York
definition[1]: a horse which won many US horse races in the 1970s
definition[2]: the office of a government or international organization which runs its daily affairs
